key_risks: Tenant-related challenges, including financial instability and potential lease defaults
High sensitivity to interest rate fluctuations
Exposure to retail sector volatility and economic downturns

controversies: Declining investor sentiment and increased short interest
Potential shareholder value dilution from equity offerings for acquisitions
environmental_issues: Exposure to risks related to environmental regulations and sustainability practices
social_issues: Potential impact of changing consumer preferences on tenant performance
